properties.areaDesc: Burns Harbor to Michigan City IN; Gary to Burns Harbor IN
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 15 at 3:55AM CST until January 16 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Small Craft
Advisory, which is in effect from 6 PM this evening to 9 PM CST
Thursday.

* WINDS...to 30 kt from the northwest.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...6 to 9 ft.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...12 ft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
are expected to produce hazardous wave conditions to small craft.
Inexperienced mariners...especially those operating smaller
vessels should avoid navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM CST THURSDAY
